channel.title: About on Pedro Carmona
channel.description: Recent content in About on Pedro Carmona

item.title: About
item.description: I am a Portuguese Software Developer living in The Netherlands. Currently working at Goboony as Full Stack Developer. Goboony is a platform that allows travellers to rent motorhomes from a local owner. Background: I started learning programming in the University, in 2009. There, I had the oportunity to learn Python, C and Java. During studies, I also worked as Web Developer for Whitesmith, developing a Ruby on Rails website. In 2014, received MsC in Computer Engneering from the University of Coimbra, Portugal.
